name: Bristol Ultimate Development
description: We are a sociable, development-focused ultimate frisbee club open to anyone wanting to try the sport!

time.details: Social games. See the Facebook group for the latest details.

cost.details: Outdoor sessions are free to join.

booking.details: Booking recommended so the organisers have a sense of numbers, please join the Facebook group and vote in the latest poll.

time.details: Please sign up on the Facebook group for each individual hour you want. Due to player cap, we will pick squads and announce them the night before.

location.address: Shine Sports Hall, Brecon Road, Henleaze, BS9 4DT

cost.details: The first session is free. After that, it's £4 per session, with bank transfer details available on the Facebook group.

booking.details: Booking required for each individual hour. Squad lists will be announced the night before.

time.details: Please sign up for each individual hour you want. Due to player cap, we will pick squads and announce them the night before.
